Warehouse Keeper Wilford: Welcome to the Iron Gate Guild! You can deposit your valuables here for only 30 Adena per item. Let's get down to business. What price can you put on peace of mind? With our service, you never have to worry about thieves or untimely death depriving you of your most treasured possessions...
